Democratizing Access to Mental Wellness

Helping students access self-directed tools that support internal clarity and forward movement.

Fund a MindLearn how the pilot works

Not therapy. Not diagnosis. Access.

DMWF helps students access self-directed tools that support internal clarity and forward movement.

Our Mission

The Pilot

DMWF funds licensed student access, coordination, and independent observation of outcomes. No funds go to technology development or private profit.
